short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smartlink Heatlh is a software used to extract appointments, log diagnosis, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smartlink Health's software enables the real-time exchange of data between EHRs and other health IT systems, including: 
*Presentation of diagnosis gaps and care gaps within the clinical workflow
*Insertion of clinical information into patient records
*Extraction of patient information, such as orders, referrals, labs, appointments, demographics, and other data from the EHR
